name: Kixed Logon Script
short_description:
I like gpo but i need to personnalize the environnement of my users in Terminal Server.
So i've created a logon script to suite my needs.

It has been written in kix just because I like it :P and it's very quick to write. 
So, it's fully possible to adapt it in vbs or wsh.

I share it today because i think it could help someone ;o)

It's open source, so you can use it as you like. 
But be kind and let my name/SF links in the head.

************

There is 4 scripts :

1. The core : mapping, patching, mailing, stats.
2. The copyicons : creating the icons/applications environnement of the user (desktop & start menu)
3. The Starter : this script is launched with each application, it creates complete stats in a mysql server and put live message on the screen, different for each application.
4. The Functions. Thanks to kixtart UDF !

And now ? Go to the wiki !
summary: Logon script for windows server environnement in Kixtart
